objects.description: [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002)'s MISC::AddSid module can appended any SID or user/group account to a user's SID-History. [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002) also utilizes [SID-History Injection](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1178) to expand the scope of other components such as generated Kerberos Golden Tickets and DCSync beyond a single domain.

external_references.description: Metcalf, S. (2015, November 13). Unofficial Guide to Mimikatz & Command Reference. Retrieved December 23, 2015.
Metcalf, S. (2015, August 7). Kerberos Golden Tickets are Now More Golden. Retrieved December 1, 2017.
